name: J.A.N.U.S.
description:
The Domed City of Arcus, 3047

Magical girls have existed since the dawn of time. That much Nulla, a time mage and a veteran magical girl, knows. And like everyone else, there are certain event she’s like to get rid of.

Enter J.A.N.U.S., an ongoing project to perfect time travel. The Julian Access Navigation Universal Server is a team effort in revolutionizing mission completion.

But when the experiments release an overwhelming number of bugs into the timeline, Nulla and her team must race against the clock. Or else time itself will collapse.

---

J.A.N.U.S. was made for the Magical Girl Game Jam #3. This is the jam version and story prototype.

---

Credits
  • Art, story, programming - Red Lily
  • Music - Kevin Macleod
  • Additional SFX - Freesound.org
